WorkItem.ClosedComment: Will be possible into WPP V2.
WorkItem.Description:
Exporting or importing multiple updates currently requires going through the process of exporting or importing updates one at a time. This requires a lot of user interaction.

Having the option to export or import multiple updates would ease the amount of user interaction required to export or import many updates at once.
WorkItem.Summary: Feature Request: Import/Export collections of updates

Comments.Message: Possible use cases are starting up a new WSUS server or sharing the updates with another WSUS admin.
